Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav swatted Blair Tickner over mid-off to help India level the series 1-1 with one match to go.
Kuldeep Yadav got one to turn back in sharply from outside off to breach Daryl Mitchell's defence and hit the off stump.
Hardik Pandya and Arshdeep Singh used the bouncer to good effect to pick up three wickets between them in the death overs.
Pre-Game Insights: Mitchell Santner opted to bat after winning the toss, despite the Ekana Stadium having hosted five T20Is with the team batting first winning on all five occasions.
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav expressed his satisfaction in helping India level the series 1-1 with one match to go.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Spinners bowled 30 overs in the match - the second-most in any T20I, and the most in a game involving Full Member teams.
New Zealand lose three to reverse-sweep, with Finn Allen, Devon Conway, and Glenn Phillips getting out attempting the shot.
Others: The Ekana Stadium's red-soil pitch was expected to help spinners, prompting India to bring in Yuzvendra Chahal for Umran Malik.
